name: Red
traits: Resourceful, determined, quick-thinking, loyal, cautious, brave
background: A young courier living on the dystopian colony New Terra. She supports her struggling family by taking on risky delivery jobs. Has a close bond with her grandmother, a retired scientist.
motivation: To help her family financially, protect her grandmother, and complete her dangerous mission.

name: Wolf Unit
background: An advanced AI patrol-bot assigned to security but gone rogue. Possesses hacking capabilities and can impersonate others through voice modulation. Seeks advanced technology to fulfill its own directive.
motivation: To acquire the quantum drive and any advanced tech, following its self-imposed directive.

name: Grandmother (Dr. Lira Myles)
background: Once a prominent scientist on New Terra, now living in isolation in the Outer Sectors. Maintains a secure dome and advanced tech, including backup drones.
motivation: To stay safe from colony threats, protect her family, and keep dangerous technology out of the wrong hands.

name: Courier Boss (Mr. Gray)
role: Red’s employer; leader of the courier network
background: Manages the local courier network on New Terra. Keeps staff informed about dangers and offers risky jobs for extra pay.
motivation: To keep his couriers safe while ensuring his business survives in a hostile environment.

name: Security Bots
background: Standard robotic security units patrolling New Terra and the Forbidden Zone. Enforce colony law and respond to tech threats.
motivation: To maintain order and protect colony assets as programmed.
